synopsis.text: Club of Problem Solvers, assemble! Led by the fashion-conscious Ari, a group of fifth-grade friends embarks on a mission to help their peers overcome everyday challenges. But when the club struggles to find its first case, Ari's life takes a magical turn after she discovers a talking hamster on a quest to find a mystical ring. Little does she know, this encounter grants her extraordinary powers, allowing her to transform into an adult and collect hope energy to aid those in need. As Ari and her friends juggle school life and their newfound responsibilities, they become the beacon of hope not just for their fellow students, but for the enchanted Flowering Kingdom threatened by despair energy. Can Ari and her Problem Solving Club harness the power of hope to restore balance in both worlds and thwart the sinister plans of Queen Canaby? Join this whimsical adventure to find out!
